title: Avast Internet Security + Premier Antivirus 2016 Build 11.1.2245
description:
Avast Internet Security / Premier Antivirus 2016 Build 11.1.2245 + Keys [4realtorrentz]

Avast Internet Security is a robust security suite that houses numerous tools to protect your system. The suite includes a firewall, antivirus, anti-phishing tool, vpn secure line, and smart scan tools.

With Avast Internet Security you can adjust the parameters of scan modes; pick target areas to scan, enable the scan mode for all file types. Or you can customize the scan to recognize file types by content/name extension/user-defined file extension.

Key features include:

- Firewall.
- Real time threat detection.
- Anti-phishing tool.
- Sandbox.
- Antivirus.
- VPN Secure Line.
- Anti-spam tool.
- Smart Scan.
- Robust protection.

Avast Internet Security also includes some new technologies such as secure dns, scan https, and home security network to add to your protection.

What's New Avast Internet Security 2016 11.1.2245:

- Added option to disable the email signature to Setttings-> General 
- SafeZone browser now automatically imports bookmarks and passwords from old SafeZone
- Added shortcut for SafeZone browser to systray menu
- Passwords extension for Firefox is now signed
- Added icons for scans
- HTTPS scanning now supports SPDY protocol
- Fixed problems with browsing on Windows XP
- Fixed issues with expired certificates needed for HTTPS scanning
- Update popup not shown when just checking for latest version 
- Fixed missing option to delete custom scan
- Fixed wrong displayed text in menu
- Fixed problems with SecureDNS
- Fixed missing Spanish language in Home network security

Requirements: Windows (All Versions)
Languages: Multiple languages

=================================================================================================

Avast Premier Antivirus 2016 Build 11.1.2245 + Keys [4realtorrentz]

Avast Premier Antivirus is a full PC protection suite. The application has numerous features and multi-function security tools to PROTECT YOUR PC. It has a modern, friendly and intuitive user interface, is very easy to use and is very powerful.

Avast are constantly updating their database of virus definitions, meaning your computer will be protected against the latest spyware, viruses and potentially hazardous websites. The application has a large and active community following that quickly alerts the development team of new security threats which are swiftly countered and added to Avastâ€™s significant database.

Key features include:

- Smart SCAN.
- Real-time protection.
- ANTI VIRUS anti-spyware, and anti rootkit tools.
- System optimization.
- Friendly user interface.
- Avast Premier Antivirus also includes some new technologies such as secure dns, scan https, and home security network to add to your protection. The browser add-on further improves your PC'S security with features like cookie and social tracking blocking

What's New Avast Premier Antivirus 2016 Build 11.1.2245:

- Added option to disable the email signature to Setttings-> General 
- SafeZone browser now automatically imports bookmarks and passwords from old SafeZone

- Update popup not shown when just checking for latest version 
- Fixed missing option to delete custom scan
- Fixed wrong displayed text in menu

- Fixed missing Spanish language in Home network security

Requirements: Windows (All Versions)
Languages: Multiple languages

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Extract The Keys Pack
3. Double Click On The Key File (Note some keys aren't working)
4. Click Yes->Ok
5. Done
